channel.title: Teaching on Justin Sybrandt
channel.description: Recent content in Teaching on Justin Sybrandt

item.title: Learn to Program Python
item.description:
I, on occasion, put together python tutorial videos as a way to explain the basics of programming to interested friends. Unfortunately, with my schedule, these don’t come out as often as I would like, but the episodes are available for anyone interested.

Look for updates to this series on YouTube
